# markdown

- [render-markdown.nvim 编辑器实时渲染markdown](https://github.com/MeanderingProgrammer/render-markdown.nvim)
- [live-preview 浏览器实时渲染](https://github.com/brianhuster/live-preview.nvim)
- [img-clip 粘贴图片](https://github.com/hakonharnes/img-clip.nvim)
- [bullets 列表自动接下一个](https://github.com/bullets-vim/bullets.vim)

## depend util 

### mac
```zsh
brew install pngpaste
```


### arch
```zsh 
paru -S wl-clipboard
```
